practice_phrases: I wanted to learn yesterday.
我昨天想学。
You started talking yesterday.
你昨天开始说话。
She wanted to meet people yesterday.
她昨天想认识人。
We looked forward to going yesterday.
我们昨天期待走。
I wanted to speak better yesterday.
我昨天想说得更好。
I don't want to stop learning yesterday.
我昨天不想停止学。
People who speak Chinese wanted to help yesterday.
会说中文的人昨天想帮。
I wanted to meet her as soon as possible yesterday.
我昨天想尽快认识她。
Will you help me learn her name before going yesterday?
你昨天会在走之前帮我学她的名字吗？
I wanted to speak better because it's useful yesterday.
我昨天想说得更好因为它很有用。

seed_context.known: 我昨天想问你一些事情。
seed_context.target: I wanted to ask you something yesterday.
